content.detailedDescription: Shiny object caught my eye and i took a zoomed picture. never seen anything like it before. spotted it above kbuf.  it doesn't like a weather balloon as i have seen many launched from the nws at kbuf often.  if you have any idea what it is let me know.
content.summary: Shiny object caught my eye and i took a zoomed picture. never seen anything like it before.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing some large bright lights/objects hovering over dc from brookland ne by dctv metro station, also white unmarked oblong craft during day over ft totten ne/nw sta. first obj over bklnd seem red large bright obj.Over bnai temple steeple from bklnd sta is west directly toward 14&oak nw intersection west of bklnd me 9&michigan/newton st ne, brooks mansion houses dctv sta next to brookland metro rail train sta along side csx amtrack hot rails. during months, i get off train btwn 10-1030 through 1130-1230a sometimes after 1230-130a last bus on friday nights only. during 2-3hr noticed a lot of ninghts, several large bright objects since stars planets too small over brightly lit station area in dc hard to see regular stars planets with naked eye, so after my camera captured images of obj in sky, noticed obj was moving very quickly zigzagging constantly hovering within viewfinder box of camera app, while taking multiple f 1/8 high speed 8-15-25 imaged per second - minute. 
in apt may began noticing a second larger obj directly across opposite direction of initial red emitting obj, over pkg lot across metro and bus sta beyond dctv metro ph lot dye east of first obj.
second obj is larger, emits blue blue-green glow. in june while ibserving taking 600-700 photos so far, of objects hovering, shspeshifting, rotating, morphing...
while taking pictures of lg obj blue#1 with a smaller obj nearby lower to right, suddenly a high super warp speed obj oblong flies by out of nowhere materializes near blue#1 and flies across b#1 very fast disappears again about 1-2 hand lengths in sky my hand span is about 7in so no more than 7-14in in front if me but miles up in sky? 
immediately after this sighting, a commercial airplane slowy passes across similar path, across sky blinking slowly, across from right to left about se to northeast across easterly b#1 , i could not take pictures in awe wondering if anyone on plane could see b#1 beyond it easterly direction ? 
it happened within 2-3seconds of each other.
i tried taking pix of commercial airplane but nothing came up on ph camera images too far too dark and happened too fast only 2-3 seconds and my ph software was slow. i turned to red#1 and took more images. saw another flyby across r#1 obj un milliseconds too fast to capture. 
gota by may june 2red obj #1 & #4 and 2 blue obj #2 & bg#4 and 2 flybys at warp speeds across in front of hovering stationary morphing obj, often has tail light stream from main craft.
in jun blue #2 showed itself to me via my ph camera lens, suddenly while taking 8-15/sec obj seemed to appear visible to my naked eye as if it used my ph camera lens to zoom in on itself, previously could not physically zoom in too blury to see any detail if craft or lights, only could capture light changing shapes from distant, appearing in pictures like blurred lights and changed shapes two lights, oblong cigar shaped triangular, spherical and square shapes with shadows, tails and other light coming from other sides of objs not visible from this view. 
obj took me perhaps telepathically close to it, and even with my poor eyesight i was only once able to see craft clearly as a dome sphere shaped ark metallic reflective surface like mirror material similar to surface of sony touch screw smart glass, multi color reflective, craft surface seem robotic computerized with intelligence and telepathic communication capabilities, with me showed itself so i can see it via ph camera lens almost as if changed my ph technology capabilities beyond f 1/8 20.7megapixels hd camera lens, i felt for a few seconds within milliseconds that i was out there near close enough to craft to see it up close.
space craft was spherical dome shaped with "layers" of shielded square doors on outter surface ay least four maybe five layers of squared surfaces all same dark metallic multi reflective smart glass type of material, very "cloaking" reflecting everything in outterspace in dark if space had window almost yet barely visible, i felt more like it was telepathic than physical vision and almost as if it brought me out to it with capability of phone camera lens"zoomed" me to see it and then i looked at ph screen image and i was back in earth nit in the phone image next to closer to craft. space craft seem very large pod like biosphere biodome, had "tails" of white light as it revolved and changed shapes in my poor images compared to the vision of it it just revealed itself to me, intelligent computer robot built in the outter surface material of craft able to communicate with me. 

after june, i lost my phone jul2 before 1215 am on metro fm train to bklnd 
i saw few more sightings almost every other night weekly if i were out returning on metro to bklbd about same time.

in july the blue #1 obj seem to have moved directly over above bus stop 90Â° overhead i had to lay in my wheelchair to see it directly over me. 
it looked like similar obj i saw previous months with anothe smaller obj nearby also doundlg same hovering maneuvers zigzagging back and forth at sharp angles like drones scanning the sky then it suddenly moved across sky very quickly from location toward bnai westerly east over bus stop and repositioned itself over brookland bus stop toward former positions easterly beyond bus stop pkg lot. 

i was amazed yet my new replacement device was not fast and i wasn't able to capture the motions. several homeless men saw o j i pointed out and catholic university college students asked and thought it were just a satellite, planet or star. one didn't speak english, hispanic? spoke spanish, asked if it were star or planet. i yoke him not it's neither. but none of the bus stop patrons were very interested in looking at it. other fem student or lady just found it interesting. 

before and after thunderstorms july there were .Ore police and helicopter activity. near station. metro transit police were parked directly in bus bay but i dared not ask them to look up, and they seem engrossed in their conversation work, monitoring radio and watching station entrance from across bus stop driveways. 

after storm in westerly dir over brookland train sta a helicopter flew very close dir over tree tops across sta from southwest to northeast 
helicopter activity had increased with increasing crime activity during warm spring and summer months. so right after i saw red #1 being passed by warp speed flyby obj ascending in westerly side also going from sw to north direction in sky. i was suspect of all police and helicopter passing close by over metro.

obj #2 flyby was very far in atmosphere buy crossed over path position if red #1 usu dir over bnai temple steeple.

june to july cresent moon phase i came downhill on bus from bus stop of taylor and hardwood ne intersection, saw my second flyby over too of trees and electric,lines, however too much light from electric poles, moon, trees and,lines covered sight for good pictures. i took a few with sony xperia yet not very good. craft was not commercial or known military aircraft, very far up directly over taylor sy ne brookland heights hill by catholic university dufor athletic field at bottom of hill. it flew in se dir iver street light electic wires overhead. 

again battery died or low too slow to catch high speed shot. 

seeing blue #2 and 3 obj every week in end of jul throughout aug 2015 now, finaly got old sony ph back from person who found it on metro, very suspect staged incident as guy claims name is prince never turned it in to metro lost and found nor police at union station amtrak stayin bldg where he works at fast food restaurant.  

i am very suspect of people who keep my found electronic devices without returning to station. i wonder if thus has been happening in past with all my phones and electronic devices being lost stolen on trains buses. i have recovered 2 -3 devices when i know exactly when and where i dropped then as being last person on bus or train before it goes out of device and back into yard or maintenance station where employees cleaning out station trains and buses usually find my lost devices immediately after i drop them within 30min. 

these are only pix of moon, as my images are in sony and uploaded to google plus account and drive @dancingqueendc son are un twitter uploads but mostly i have emailed cropped shots to wilbur allen @ufodc expert who has confirmed my sightings images and plans to set up cameras to film possible portal or wormhole in sky space above brookland ne dc. he is at logan circle area nw sw of my location, may be explains objs flying from sw dir toward brookland ne of logan. 

i look forward to any investigators coming to check out this area esp she ufodc wilbur allen has set up cameras to film sky activity. 

sometimes when obj rotates morphs it looks like round in middle with extensions arms or tails four to eight coming from center of obj, other times it look square triangular and like 2-3-4 bright round oblong obj and sometimes clouds form in shape of infinity mobile fig 8 over area of ibj becoming blurry cloudy and cloaking it, then it disappears in sky and reappears within second/ miliseconds of same second. i usu observe it til it disappears and looking around moon and both sides

better images are from sony xperia z1s 20.7 megapixel hd camera f 1/8 
on my google plus drive you can see i shared images with @ufodc wilbur allen on google plus 
@famed evolv3xion dancingqueen famed am.Famed.Ca at gmail or originaldancingqueen at gmail profiles thanks for reading, happy ufo hunting, truth is here black gov secret ops reverse engineered alien tech right in front of us and world leaders know but most/ly us wont delidclose truth to public lying wasting billion on nasa when they we have better infinite unlimited energy technology. i know dr. john fallon, nasa engineer uk citizen us dod contractor, july former supervisor is julia rauker usn pms 452 tbmdmissile telemetry spectral mgt former nasa engr 15-30yr us dod contractor. i have top secret nasa enginees saying yes we know about all these thingsincl hole in north n poles to hollow earth and other anomalies unknown to public. 
we need disclosure.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my garden at the time, i am always looking up to the sky, i thought it was a drone at first, silver orb flying over with no noise, i watched it disappear very fast in the direction of murcia
content.summary: Pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:45ish on the night of august the 22nd 2015 my girlfriend was leaving her home to come to visit me and as she left her home about a tenth of a mile from mine, she noticed an red orangish orb object flying in a straight path above the colorado river.  (we both live by the river front). by the time she drove to my house and i went out doors to greet her, our attention was drawn to a second object in the sky, same color, no sound, flying just above the casino's.  we assumed the last one observed was following the direction of the first one.  we observed the last one together and argued it was drones or something known since it had no sound and they were following one another but then the last one did something i don't believe a drone could do.  the second orb after it passed by all the casino's slowly as though looking for something, suddenly began an ascent into the night sky at a very rapid speed and a few blinks later it was beyond sight, vanished.  i have witnessed, as your records will reflect, many ufo's in my lifetime but i have never seen anything like this.  i searched for other sightings around or near my site and it appears that people in phoenix were inundated with sightings on the same night.  they did not describe these objects though. just one last note; all the animals in the neighborhood were acting neurotic, the feral animals i feed outdoors failed to show up for their nightly food, which is highly irregular, domestics were howling, my cats trying to hide and then after these things came and went, every animal was fine.  my girlfriend was electrified with electric static for a few days afterwards, everything she touched gave her a shock but i didn't have the same thing.  i just got spooked living alone and couldn't sleep well for a few nights.  neither of us had our cell phones with us and did not take pictures.  sorry.
content.summary: Two wittnesses at ten minutes apart saw one of two red orangish oval shaped ovjects fly over the colorado river from the south then ascend into the sky at high speeds and vanish.

content.detailedDescription: In summer of 1968, i was visiting my aunt and uncle with my family. my sister and i stayed in their trailer. during the night i woke up and looked out the trailer window and saw two oval dark objects hovering in vertical positions next to each other above the tree tops. i became extremely terrified. my sister and her baby, on the bottom bunk, did not wake up even though i strongly shook her. i left the trailer and locked it behind me thinking that would keep them safe. i ran past the animals that were in an enclosed area. they were racing around and frantic. the hair on my arms stood up. it was almost like static electricity was in the air and the air felt strange almost like time was slowed down, it's very hard to explain the feeling of the atmosphere and the terror i was feeling. i was somewhere by or past the animals when i heard telepathically "don't be afraid, we're not going to hurt you." i was still scared and then proceeded to the small guest house, where i thought my parents were staying. unknown to me they had left the guest house because of black widow spiders. i banged and yelled at the door but there was no answer and i think i opened it but they weren't there. i continued to look back and the objects were still there, then proceeded to the main house. i got my parents up and tried to tell them what i saw but at that precise time there was a car accident on the road in front of the house. everyone ran out to it. by the time i got anyone to look, the objects were gone. when i told them what i saw they all laughed. that devastated me. it's hard to explain how i felt afterwards. i was almost in a shock and walked around feeling numb. there was one other time when i felt that kind of shock and that was when my brother was killed in a freak accident. i tell you that to try and convey to you how this effected me. i never spoke to anyone else about this until i got married. years later i became interested in going to mufon meetings and became a field investigator for mufon. i'm searching for answers as to what i saw and experienced.
content.summary: I woke up to see two vertical hovering objects side by side above the tree tops. outside the hair on my arms stood up and the air felt strange around me. heard a voice telepathically tell me "do not be afraid, we're not going to hurt you."

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the upstairs hallway and noticed a very bright light in the air. it appeared to be within one or two miles of me. i observed it and the movements it made were not like any that current aircraft is capable of. also, there were no anti-collision light or strobes. just a very bright light. at first it appeared to be flying two miles away, parallel to my road, but within a minute it changed directions and was heading straight for me. i didn't know what to do so i ran to grab my phone (only took 15 seconds) and when i came back, no craft. by the speed it was moving and the position of it in the sky, there was no way that any normal aircraft could disappear like that. to make it even weirder, i asked siri on my phone, and used an aircraft tracker app, and both told me that no aircraft was visible in my area. i came back minutes later and noticed nothing in the sky, but did notice more air traffic than usual during the day, only hours after the sighting.
content.summary: Extremely bright light following a path and changing direction

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were out in front of our rv when some lights caught my attention out towards the east. i pointed them out to my wife and jokingly said look ufos to which she replied, those are helicopters.
  they looked to me like two helicopters following an airplane but as i looked harder the two in the rear were following a light. that's what it looked like to me, like the interior light of an airplane shining thru the windshield of the forward plane (or whatever it was). i grew up close to a small airport so i've seen planes and helicopters at night and these didn't look quite right. the two units in the rear had the normal red green and white strobe on but they seem to blink from the same place and weren't uniform, the strobe would flash every second for a few seconds and then flash twice very quickly and maybe not flash for a couple seconds more, i can't be sure but i think the other two lights (red and green) flashed every once in a while also.
 these three (units) were also flying very close to each other, i would guestimate around 100 to 125 feet from each other. i'm not a pilot but i would think the faa has rules about flying so close.
  the forward unit was just a light (what i saw looked like a light shining thru a windshield) the two behind had the same windshield light with blinking strobe lights, they made no sound and couldn't have been but a mile away flying about the speed of an airplane or helicopter ( i would guess 80-100 mph) and i'm guessing 1000-1500 feet up from the ground. because of the darkness i couldn't make out any shapes so it could have been three small planes flying in formation but they were way to close to each other and the lead plane didn't have running lights.
  my wife went back into the rv and i sat down outside and kept looking around the skies and saw what i consider space junk (dull star like lights traveling in a south to north or west to east direction) and was ready to go in the rv and go to bed when from the nw came a light like a bright star which i thought was a commercial jetliner. i was waiting for the strobe to flash or to see the wing lights to confirm that it was a jet (there was a lot of airline traffic that night). i did see a flashing light but it was bluish green and it flashed out ahead of the craft in a cone shape and wasn't as bright as the airplanes i'd seen earlier that night. it turned in a large circle and headed to the ne. i told my wife that i had seen another ufo and she just said "yeah right" and told me to come in it was getting late. i've never witnessed a ufo but i think i saw four of them that night.
content.summary: Two helicopters following light

content.detailedDescription:
My older brother and i were playing in front of the house on grant street side, and then my brother looks up and in a startled expression he states what is that i looked in the direction he was looking and saw a metallic shiny ufo saucer shaped slowly traveling above my neighbors house on the franklin street side as it started finish its run from one end of the house to the other it slowly started to turn and then in a blink of an eye it was gone.I needin say that it kinda shook us up. i've never reported this to any agency such as mufon untill now,
i was approximately 9 years old at the time.
content.summary: Ufo flies over house in new holland, pa.

content.detailedDescription: I am 62 and just need to get this told. i was young staying with grand parents home. we were out side burning a bomb fire and they sent me in side to get more paper. i went to the back door i heard them calling for me to look out something coming down and i turn around and this beam of light hit me its was like going around really slow. i called for help and that's all i remember. i was maybe 5 - 7 years old. also just wanted to add this i have a pace maker and before i got it i look to (se) and a flash of seems like light and feel like when i was young and my heart stoped. but that's not all i went into this white room? when to hospital and this time when i flat line i was sitting in this room and saw what looked like a door. i know this sounds crazy but when i was in the military i found this glass place in my leg took it out and keep it until i lost it. didn't think of it at the time but it feels i still have something still in my leg. well that's it. thank you for reading this i know you all would under stand.
content.summary: Star like bean going around real slow.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my front porch just looking at sky. one orange orb appeared than a second shortly behind it. my wife spotted as well. i knew right away this wasn't a plane.  the 2 objects few in tandem one shortly in front of the other. was shocking but exciting at the same time. the 2 orbs flew outbid sight behind the house in front of me over ocean. i have video. i can't figure out how to up load ion your site. i would be happy to send it to you. i posted on face book and will post on youtube
content.summary: 2 orange orbs flying left to right south on ocean isle beach. the disappearing over ocean

content.detailedDescription:
1.)  i was leaving and walking to my car,  which can be seen in the lower left of some of the pictures -- the silver colored chevy volt.  

2.)  while it looked like the moon was shining through some clouds -- it was overcast that evening --, the shape of the lights caught my attention:  it looked disc shaped and it didn't appear to be moving or changing shape which is what you'd expect it to do if it was the moon shinning through clouds -- as the clouds move, the moonlight shining through them should change shape too... but the shape of these lights didn't change for as long as i was observing them, which was for approximately 5 minutes.   

3.)  my first thought about what i was seeing was that it was the moon shinning through some clouds, and so i fired up the star-chart app on my smartphone and sure enough the app indicated that that's approximately where the moon was.  but the next night (or it could have been a couple of nights after), as i was leaving work at the same time it was a clear night and i noticed that the moon was nowhere near where i had seen the strange series of lights -- it was approximately 20 degrees up higher in the sky.  in fact, upon paying closer examination to the pictures i took, you can see where the moon really was:  the moon's directly above the storage building, it's in the top 1/3 of the picture and it looks like a bright dot of light (my car is in the lower left), and you can see that the disc-shaped anomaly is much lower in the sky, and from where i took the picture it appears directly above the rh side of the storage building.  

4.)  from where i was standing at the entrance to rfa engineering, looking south.  the disc-shaped light anomaly didn't appear to be moving, or changing shape.  i also thought it could be spotlights but as you can see, there's no spotlights shinning up at the disc-shaped anomaly.  after observing it in the rfa parking lot, i wanted to try to get some pictures of it where there was less light pollution, and so i drove over to the nearby wells fargo and snapped a picture from the parking lot there -- the disc-shaped anomaly still had the same shape as before and didn't appear to be moving.  because my smartphone star chart app told me that that's where the moon was -- and as i already mentioned, the app was wrong (because i hadn't calibrated my phone's compass before using the app) --, i just dismissed what i was seeing as a curious play of moonlight and really slow moving clouds.  but why would the moon only illuminate this one particular bank of clouds and not anything else, especially considering that the moon was so much higher up in the sky.  

5.  i was intrigued, and if i hadn't dismissed it as the moon poking through the clouds i probably would have paid much closer attention to the disc-shaped anomaly, including trying to take better pictures of it, and i would have watched it for a much longer period of time.  

6.)  after dismissing it as the moon poking through some clouds -- which it turns out that it couldn't have been --, i left for home.
content.summary: Leaving work, saw a weird, disc-shaped series of lights off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:06 pm i went outside to do some stargazing. i noticed at least 3 planes and one satelite in the sky within 10 minutes. 

10:26- i for some reason directed my attention to the sky nearly straight above my head, and i saw a light that was moving at a high speed. this light seemed to be the same size as the stars but i could not establish a size. already seeing planes and one satelite before this, it wasn't something i seen before. i continued to watch this light move but then it stopped, and changed direction. i couldn't believe my eyes, then it suddenly disappeared. shortly after i saw a low flying plane, right over my house which is extremley uncharateristic to my area.

during this event i pulled out my video camera to try to capture a video but the light would not show up on the camera.
content.summary: Thought it was a satelite, but then it changed direction and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
At 11pm, in the summer of 2002, my friend and i were driving north on the great highway, along san francisco's ocean beach.  at about the point where ulloa street meets its west end, we spotted a glowing orange orb, about the size of a basketball (or slightly larger), hovering about 30 feet from the ground on the west side of the road, to our left.  as there were no other vehicles on the great highway as far as we could see, in either direction, i told my friend to slow down as we got closer and then stop.  he opened the sunroof so i could stand up and get a better look at the object.  as there were still no other cars, i told him to turn off the motor for a moment so i could listen for any sounds coming from the orb.  the object was silent.  then, it appeared as if the object was dropping a second orb that was transparent, but of identical size and color, from itself.  however, as soon as this begins to happen, the second orb fades and vanishes before it finishes dropping completely from the first.  at that point, and before lowering myself completely back into the vehicle, i told my friend to just start the car and drive.  after i was back in my seat, i watched the orb remain where we found it, but now there was a second orb that seemed to be sitting stationary in a nearby position, maybe 50 feet apart from the first one.

we drove on to the cliff house so we could talk about this over coffee.  before going in, we looked back south over ocean beach and the great highway, and observed approximately 5-7 orange dots of light along the same area we observed the first orb.  we went into the cliff house and found a table by a window that overlooked ocean beach and the great highway, and we observed the orange dots of light disappear, one-by-one.  then something else started to happen.  it looked like bonfires were appearing and disappearing and then reappearing in different places, within seconds of each other, down on ocean beach.  after a couple of cups of coffee, i asked my friend to drive back down near the beach so we could get a closer look at these bonfires.  we parked and walked up to the breakwater wall.  directly in front of us, on the sand, about 40 feet away, stood approximately eight half-naked silent people wearing black pants, all surrounding a fire inside of a black garbage can.  we'd seen enough and my friend took me home.
content.summary: Stationary, glowing, orange orb hovering at edge of highway.

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this on behalf of a friend who does not wish to be identified or traced. the following however is his account, and the photographs he took are his photos, taken with his phone. in his words:

------------------------------------

it was the night of june 12, 2015, early morning of june 13th. between midnight and 2 am, approximately 1 am or so. i was outside just relaxing, and suddenly i looked up and saw this strange object. i just happened to look up and see it.

immediately i could tell it wasn't normal. if i had to describe it, as crazy as this will sound, i would say it looked like some sort of robotic space craft. 

it was a dark green metallic looking, hexagonal shaped cylinder. this cylinder was rotating, and had what i can only call plasma-looking light sources burning out of several apertures on the tail end. these were white in color, with some reddish orange as well. it did not look like fire or like lights. it looked like some sort of "energy" which is why i say plasma. that's the closest thing to it my mind can come up with.

at the opposite end (what i call the "head") was a black cone shaped, pointed head. like a space capsule or a rounded triangle of some kind. this portion was not rotating like the hexagonal cylinder was, and had no lights of any kind.

the object's surface looked somehow very old and worn to me, but was clearly metallic. despite how old and beat up it looked, it was clearly technologically advanced. it wasn't some drone or an ordinary air craft. i got a clear look at it, and it definitely wasn't normal.

based on my estimated distance from it, and other measurement factors, myself and a friend estimated its size as somewhere between 30 and 70 feet in length (depending upon distance,) and no more than 144 feet away.

it moved across the trees at that approximate distance, then stopped and hovered. as it hovered, it seemed to descend very slightly. the rear portion never stopped rotating. i looked down at my phone to get a picture, which i succeeded in doing. when i looked back up, it was vanishing out of view due to distance and obstruction. i did not see it again after this.

there were no unusual sensations or feelings, other than being very weirded out by it.

------------------------------

i, his friend, reporting this on his behalf, saved and renamed the images. but they are otherwise unaltered to my knowledge. they also contain a sketch he made illustrating what he saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Dark green & black metallic hexagonal rotating cylinder w/"plasma-like" propulsion extruding from rear & conical non-rotating nose

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette with my wife,on an outside porch, around 10:00, i looked in the sky to look at the stars, when i noticed what i thought was a plane. then realized it had no blinking lights, as most flying aircfrat usually have. as i started watching it started on a normal flight path,and 3 seconds in it start to incline and then straightens out and after a second it inclines again. after the second inclination, i was more than positive i was witnessing a ufo and turned to call over some friends to also bare witness but after a quick check to make sure that it was still there, it disappeared and declined from inviting friends to spectate
content.summary: Star like object flew from west to east, flew in straight path for a second, inclined for same length , then ent back to flying horizontally and then inclined again, and right after disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in front of my computer when the screen started to act strange. one corner of it got really dark then it crashed. while it was restarting, i got up to let my dogs out and smoke. i was on my deck next to the lap pool and i saw the ufo come down and hoover about 250 feet from me. it was there for about 20 seconds then took off straight up at a very high speed.
content.summary: It looked like a smooth, circular ship with 3 lights on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: Watching the night sky as i do every night.  i saw the pulsing v shape which looked like 2 separate lights slightly oval in shape meeting to form the v.   flying at the altitude of a small airplane.  as i watched, a small star like point of light crossed its path going in the opposite direction and then vanished.   this occurred directly overhead.
content.summary: 2 oval lights in v shape pulsing going w to e slower than a small plane's speed plus a star moving in the opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car waiting on my driver to come out of his doctors office.   i was leaning back looking out the window when i spotted it.   at first i thought it might be a plane but realized there were no wings.   i tried to take a photo with the telephone but i have never done that before and fumbled while watching the object.  i looked down at the phone and when i looked back up, it was gone.  the object was strikingly white.   it reminded me of the space shuttle when i saw it pass over once.  the sky was clear and beautiful.   i spotted 3 ufo's on this same day.   2 more at night.  i will report them separately.  i am a daily sky watcher and have many times observed amazing ufo's.
content.summary: White cigar shape flew overhead at altitude that a jet might fly if it was the size of a jet but it could be bigger

content.detailedDescription: The subject was the cloud structure facing due west  the cloud structure was almost like an 'em' pulse with the downward drafting being very wisp and turbulent.  the ufo object was not observed at the time stamp of the captured image.  lately, there have been many military aircraft in this area to assist in fire fighting.  but also, there have been fighter jet activity, either from the public airport, to the north and west in the picture direction, and from a straight line from north to south.  we have no military installation in this area.  also seen, are high altitude jets from the east heading west, then making a large arc back eastbound.  this is happening almost daily.  could this be some of the saber rattling between east and west?
content.summary: The subject was the cloud structure, almost like an 'em' pulse with the downward drafting being very wisp and turbulent.  the ufo object was not observed at the time stamp of the captured image.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a soccer field. saw dark hovering object against sky to tehe east. at first i thought it was a photography drone. i grabbed my camera and started capturing the object, then, i was not pretty sure what it was, because i could not see propellers, like the ones on a drone.
the object had a manta-ray shape. surface did not reflected sunlight much, despite it was a bright morning.
 object overerd downtown, similar to a drone type-flight. it descended a few meters and flew slowly towards north. object ended up near a hill where i lost sight, blended with tree canopy. sighting lasted around 11 minutes.
content.summary: Similar to a manta ray shape

content.detailedDescription: At home, on deck in front of house,was told there was a lunar eclipes, went out to take pics. of the moon , not knowing what to look for, took random pic.S, looking at them the next day discovered an object moving below the moon,from left to right, when zoomed looked like a round object with windows and a dome. did not notice the object at all while taking photo's.
content.summary: Was told there was lunar eclipes taking pics of the moon and caught a object traveling below and to the left to the right when zoomed saw a round disk that appear to have windows and a dome

content.detailedDescription: We were flying over the grand canyon around 7-8 am pacific time, and these bright lights caught my eye in a valley below. the front object had 2 lights in front like headlights the 2 object behind the first had 1. the 2nd object then started to blink on a second front light reflecting just like the first but in only blinked on for a second then went back to omitting 1. really bright really weird. nothing was around these objects, no buildings ppl or anything of the kind. the location was very remote.
content.summary: Flying into los angeles flying over grand canyon saw 3 lights reflecting brightly.

content.detailedDescription:
Goodnight amis 42 years this is my story, is real and without exaggeration, the first was at age 10 had a meeting 31 december in moments that my family celebrated the new year in the city of guayaquil, i was hiding me my uncles, i hid in the back of a van, while lying saw in the sky a round shape with many lights of various colors, the truth is that i only remember seeing my family this flying saucer not me and found a few hours after waking up me sane in my bed, and arrives to h ...... do not know the second sighting was in my 18 years when he was performing the militia in eastern ecuador you were near the 7pm night and we were forming a group of military and saw into the sky and saw a light in the starry sky that had a light like star that went from one place to another and changing directions estubo having it near a 20 minutes and then desaarecio in fiemamento, i believe in ufo's, and what i saw real news, this is what i saw hope to have an answer, and offer my support to your research

att. walter roses
stale ecuador guayaquil city
content.summary: Sighting in ecuador

content.detailedDescription: Bright green comet with tail spotted south south east on 75Â° decline over gulf of mexico
content.summary: Comet with tail not reported to local tv besides me, no call back from us astrological society

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling from jackpot idaho to wells nevada around 2am by myself in my truck with my dog. i noticed a small light coming up on the road behind me wondering what a motorcycle was doing out at night when the light got bigger and bigger and then was directly behind my truck, with no noise. my dog was growling. then i looked back and it had totally disappeared. it did this several times and the more i looked at it when it was far behind the truck the faster it came right behind the truck. i started to get very scared because i knew this was something unnatural. this happened for several hours and i hurried to stay right behind a trucker. as i pulled into wells nevada i stopped at a small casino/restaurant to use the restroom and looked back at the road. in the light of the streetlamp were 4-5 skinny creatures with big heads dancing in the light of the street lamp. i rubbed my eyes and thought i had lost my mind but then looked again and they were still there. i went into the restaurant and stayed and had coffee. i told my kids about the light but never anyone about the little people until 2015, eleven years later. i saw the orbs on ancient aliens and those little people that other people have seen and the orb and little people/creatures were exactly what i saw eleven years ago.I am grateful that other people are telling what they have seen so i could open up about it too, because some people might think that you are loosing your mind.
content.summary: I was traveling by car at night when an orb came directly behind my truck and then would disappear. when i stopped and got out of my truck in wells idaho i looked back and saw five 'greys' dancing under the street light where i just came from.

content.detailedDescription: I watched a solid unblinking white light fly accross a small part of the sky. it was a little brighter than the brightest star out and about twice thier diameter. i thought it was a plane at first but no engine noise was ever made. there were no wing lights or green blue or white flashing livht like required on aircraft. as it flew from southwest to west it dimmed to a point it was almost completely out but i could just barely see the thing. then a red light of same size and intensity came on and it changed directs to my right. it then flew for a few secounds morelike 30 secounds stopped and stayed in that one spot. i ddontcknow if the red light just dimmed out from there or if it didn't stop but changed directs and flew faster at my exact line of sight. making it apear smaller and dimmer. but that was it nothing more i watched that area for a few min but nothing else happened.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I whatched a solid white just brighter than stars light fly turn. white light dimmed out red light came on. stopped in mid air red light dimmed to no longer detected object.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck drinking coffee waiting for the sun to rise on august 10, 2015 am looking northeast from grangeville idaho toward the mountains of kookia idaho. as the sun was rising i saw one large saucer hovering over the town of kooskia idaho and then two other smaller saucers joined the big one hovering and reflecting the morning sunlight. very bright with white/silver light. the smaller saucers would dart around the large saucer that stayed in one place. as the sun rose behind the mountains it reflected on the saucers and then they disappeared. they were right in the line of the sun and i couldn't see them anymore because i couldn't look directly into the sun. maybe they were still there but couldn't see them because of the bright sunlight in my eyes. there was a big thunderstorm a few days later that started huge fires in the area around kamiah idaho.
content.summary: I saw three hovering saucers in the am sitting on my deck watching the sun rise

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i leave her mothers driveway and pull up to the stop sign beside her house. in front of us sitting stationary in the sky is a huge band of uneven lights with illumination between the lights. i say to her what the "ef" if that, she says i have no idea. i get out to try and take a picture of the huge thing. it will not show up in the display of my android phone even though we both clearly see it with our eyes. a car pulls up behind my car that i left sitting in the road. i completely ignored it because i wanted whoever was in it to get out and look. it was a cop. i move my car which would have put his dash cam directly in line with the very large thing in the sky. i don't know if his equipment would capture since we could not see it in my display. he asks what were doing and i point to the sky and ask him if that looks weird and he says "yes it kinda does" i say does it look like a ufo he says "either that or something that belongs to our government". my friend said that he said in his 35 years on night shift he has never saw anything like it. he watches for a while and leaves. as we continue to watch the thing takes off. we follow the direction it went which was north on highway 27. we easily find it about a mile up the street. it was not hard to find because it was bright, huge and once again stationary. we pull into the wal-mart parking lot and continue to watch for about an hour. during this time the thing appears to tilt because a brightly lit dome that looked semi-transparent comes into view on the top of it. it also has these leg like sharp points on the bottom that also have lights on them. the bottom of it was sort of shaped like the bottom of the batman symbol. it also has a row of bright lights that appear to be on a solid band around the thing and they look like they are rotating around it. so i say to my friend at some point i saw something fly out of that thing and she said so did i, a few minutes ago. i am still trying to take pictures and it just is not happening. i think i got a picture of the thing that came out of it. because it is definitely not the big thing. i imagine that wal-mart and the murphy gas station would both have security cameras that might have captured the thing if it would even show up. while we were there watching it moved again to a position more to the north. it was as if it was in one spot then the next because i don't recall watching it motivate to the different location. i am going to include all of the pictures i took even though the very huge thing did not show up because even if it did not show up its there. we could see it with our eyes. the thing i would most like to impress upon someone is the size of this thing. it was freaking humongous. i have no idea how to judge size and distance when something is in the sky so i would not even try. i can say that i have never seen anything close to this size in the sky before. it was most definitely not anything that i had ever seen before either on tv or in the sky. if the government built this thing they really are hiding technology because it was positively sci-fi looking.
content.summary: My friend and i pulled up to a stop sign and saw this huge, bizzarly shapped thing with lights all over it.
